about_the_game:
Free DLC!

Doctor Mode brings a new game mode to Project Hospital - take over your doctors and oversee their cases, use new handy visualizations of your patient's conditions and activities.
You can create your own employees in character editor and fill their offices with new equipment and decorations. Enjoy more variety in character portraits!
The expansion also brings a new insurance company and objectives, three new customizable difficulty options, quick tutorial and a big campaign level focused on doctor and hospital progress.
Collect 8 new achievements!
detailed_description:
Free DLC!

Doctor Mode brings a new game mode to Project Hospital - take over your doctors and oversee their cases, use new handy visualizations of your patient's conditions and activities.
You can create your own employees in character editor and fill their offices with new equipment and decorations. Enjoy more variety in character portraits!
The expansion also brings a new insurance company and objectives, three new customizable difficulty options, quick tutorial and a big campaign level focused on doctor and hospital progress.
Collect 8 new achievements!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i3 3210, AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600K, AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended display: 24“ with 1920 x 1080 resolution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 3210, AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600K, AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050, AMD Radeon RX 460
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended display: 24“ with 1920 x 1080 resolution

short_description: Doctor Mode brings a new game mode to Project Hospital - take over your doctors and oversee their cases, use new handy visualizations of your patient's conditions and activities. Create your own employees in character editor! New equipment for your doctor's offices and more variety in character portraits.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Hungarian, Polish, Korean
